homepage.title: Cristian Care
homepage.whatIsIt: It is a software to help cristian communities to manager its members and to integrate each other
homepage.whoShouldUseIt: Any church with two or more members

Building apps for customers content: we've found ourselves re-rolling some of the same key features over and over again between projects. So we picked some of the things that kept popping up, implemented our own opinionated solutions for them, and then included it all in this free and open-source starter app. We hope it helps you as much as it helps us!
Have a question for us?: Have a question for us?  Maybe some feedback?  We love talking to users about Cuidado Cristao, and we're happy to answer questions about our pricing, roadmap, or business solutions.  Send us a note and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
